title: I wasted $1134 on Amazon MYSTERY TECH
description: Kinesis Freestyle Edge Split Keyboard on Amazon:  Kinesis TKO Mechanical Keyboard on Amazon:  Grid Framed Tech:  Hori Split Pad Pro for Nintendo Switch on Amazon:  ADV. NSMO JR Nintendo Switch headset on Amazon:  Mewtwo Pop! Pokemon Figure on Amazon:  Sony WF-1000XM4 Bluetooth Headphones on Amazon:  LED Hat on Amazon:   Check out @kustoo new Surface Originals series!   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  My new podcast @TheBackmarkers!  I have a TikTok!  My Twitch channel:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
